samples.context: Red Data Book is the source book which keeps a record of all the endangered animals and plants. Red Data Book is maintained internationally by an organisation. India also maintains Red Data Book for plants and animals found in India.
samples.question: What is the purpose of the Red Data Book?

samples.context: Migratory birds fly to far away areas every year during a particular time because of climatic changes. They fly for laying eggs as the weather in their natural habitat becomes very cold and inhospitable.
samples.question: Why do migratory birds travel long distances?

samples.question: Who maintains the Red Data Book in India?

samples.context: These birds have flown here from other parts of the world. Birds who cover long distances to reach another land are known as migratory birds.
samples.question: What are birds that travel long distances called?
